An intern encrypted two messages using RSA but mistakenly reused a prime for both keys. The intercepted ciphertext is: 367369284128622696837233983625701931119479396579766300981626790180771911097552472615355915149628238660391848646012827872223687680022896518750498977963677910027532111872419957505004233329840751493824746108292155483620449823757704443

The flag format is flag{...}
n=411999072571407819560262439415557040359451301500597908635427550554720887990951958516585386961883800550860361023537714718401985820603522867718194134242438282100844712548600952199355529926088998472500109397206507040031483869562201361, e=394321242831925615050824295480283712963984461726394738066131394324259758390046121301755906030841268452982343603842568931947741853834028058087685465679402751622075454567246212936674740391970473616604533965235795063767385372339408767

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{sj17kp6y}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 367369284128622696837233983625701931119479396579766300981626790180771911097552472615355915149628238660391848646012827872223687680022896518750498977963677910027532111872419957505004233329840751493824746108292155483620449823757704443
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=411999072571407819560262439415557040359451301500597908635427550554720887990951958516585386961883800550860361023537714718401985820603522867718194134242438282100844712548600952199355529926088998472500109397206507040031483869562201361, e=394321242831925615050824295480283712963984461726394738066131394324259758390046121301755906030841268452982343603842568931947741853834028058087685465679402751622075454567246212936674740391970473616604533965235795063767385372339408767
extra_info: p=20297760284607950299899522545972568274618993732549587605740917557290224891489134505160001589567714128415229987345769, q=20297760284607950299899522545972568274618993732549587605740917557290224891489134505160001589567714128415229987345769, Ï†(n)=411999072571407819560262439415557040359451301500597908635427550554720887990951958516585386961883800550860361023537674122881416604702923068673102189105889044113379613373389470364240949476306020203489789394027371611774653409587509824
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
